enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When in debug mode, the DMA continues to operate

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When in debug mode, the DMA stalls the start of a new channel. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when the system exits debug mode or the EDBG bit is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Fixed priority arbitration is used for channel selection within each group

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Round robin arbitration is used for channel selection within each group

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Any error causes the HALT bit to set. Subsequently, all service requests are ignored until the HALT bit is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Stall the start of any new channels. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when this bit is cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself goes through channel arbitration before being activated again

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself does not go through channel arbitration before being activated again. Upon minor loop completion, the channel activates again if that channel has a minor loop channel link enabled and the link channel is itself. This effectively applies the minor loop offsets and restarts the next minor loop

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled. TCDn.word2 is defined as a 32-bit NBYTES field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled. TCDn.word2 is redefined to include individual enable fields, an offset field, and the NBYTES field. The individual enable fields allow the minor loop offset to be applied to the source address, the destination address, or both. The NBYTES field is reduced when either offset is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer in the same fashion as the CX bit. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The ECX bit clears itself after the cancel is honored. In addition to cancelling the transfer, ECX treats the cancel as an error condition, thus updating the ES register and generating an optional error interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The CX bit clears itself after the cancel has been honored. This cancel retires the channel normally as if the minor loop was completed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination bus error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a destination write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No source bus error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a source read

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No scatter/gather configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DLASTSGA field. This field is checked at the beginning of a scatter/gather operation after major loop completion if TCDn_CSR[ESG] is enabled. TCDn_DLASTSGA is not on a 32 byte boundary

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No NBYTES/CITER configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_NBYTES or TCDn_CITER fields. TCDn_NBYTES is not a multiple of TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE] and TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE], or TCDn_CITER[CITER] is equal to zero, or TCDn_CITER[ELINK] is not equal to TCDn_BITER[ELINK]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination offset configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DOFF field. TCDn_DOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination address configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DADDR field. TCDn_DADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No source offset configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SOFF field. TCDn_SOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No source address configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SADDR field. TCDn_SADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE]

field.name: ERRCHN
field.description: Error Channel Number or Cancelled Channel Number

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No channel priority error

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error in the channel priorities . Channel priorities are not unique

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No cancelled transfers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded entry was a cancelled transfer by the error cancel transfer input

field.name: VLD
field.description: Logical OR of all ERR status bits

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No ERR bits are set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: At least one ERR bit is set indicating a valid error exists that has not been cleared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA request signal for the corresponding channel is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The error signal for corresponding channel does not generate an error interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The assertion of the error signal for corresponding channel generates an error interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The error signal for corresponding channel does not generate an error interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The assertion of the error signal for corresponding channel generates an error interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The error signal for corresponding channel does not generate an error interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The assertion of the error signal for corresponding channel generates an error interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The error signal for corresponding channel does not generate an error interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The assertion of the error signal for corresponding channel generates an error interrupt request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Clear only the EEI bit specified in the CEEI field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clear all bits in EEI

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Set only the EEI bit specified in the SEEI field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Sets all bits in EEI

enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Set only the ERQ bit specified in the SERQ field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Set all bits in ERQ

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Clears only the TCDn_CSR[DONE] bit specified in the CDNE field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clears all bits in TCDn_CSR[DONE]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

field.name: SAST
field.description: Set All START Bits (activates all channels)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Set only the TCDn_CSR[START] bit specified in the SSRT field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Set all bits in TCDn_CSR[START]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Clear only the ERR bit specified in the CERR field

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clear all bits in ERR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: No operation, ignore the other bits in this register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

register.name: EARS
register.description: Enable Asynchronous Request in Stop Register

field.name: EDREQ_0
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop for channel 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable asynchronous DMA request for channel 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request for channel 0

field.name: EDREQ_1
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop for channel 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable asynchronous DMA request for channel 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request for channel 1

field.name: EDREQ_2
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop for channel 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable asynchronous DMA request for channel 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request for channel 2

field.name: EDREQ_3
field.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop for channel 3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable asynchronous DMA request for channel 3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request for channel 3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Channel n can suspend a lower priority channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Channel n cannot suspend any channel, regardless of channel priority

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Channel n cannot be suspended by a higher priority channel's service request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Channel n can be temporarily suspended by the service request of a higher priority channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: 8-bit

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: 16-bit

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: 32-bit

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b100
enumeratedValue.description: 16-byte

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: 32-byte

enumeratedValue.name: 0b110
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Source address modulo feature is disabled

register.name: NBYTES_MLNO
register.description: TCD Minor Byte Count (Minor Loop Disabled)

register.name: NBYTES_MLOFFNO
register.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Enabled and Offset Disabled)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the SADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the SADDR

register.name: NBYTES_MLOFFYES
register.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop and Offset Enabled)

field.name: MLOFF
field.description: If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the SADDR

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the SADDR

register.name: CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: CITER_ELINKYES
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

field.name: DLASTSGA
field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. else This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, else a configuration error is reported

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is not explicitly started

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request

field.name: INTMAJOR
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled

field.name: INTHALF
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution

field.name: MAJORELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: No eDMA engine stalls

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each r/w

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each r/w

register.name: BITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: BITER_ELINKYES
register.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled
